resource_fields.label: Name
resource_fields.form_placeholder: e.g. Most popular Finnish first names 2019
resource_fields.description: Write a short and descriptive name for the data resource. If the data covers a specific time frame, mention that in the name.

resource_fields.group_description:
Add the data resource by uploading a file or adding a link to the data.
Select or drag the files here.
The maximum file size is 5 Gb. Valid data formats are pdf, jpg, jpeg, png, doc, docx, xls, xlsx, csv, ppt, pptx, odt, ods, txt.
Link: Add a link to the data.

resource_fields.label: Format
resource_fields.description: File format of the selected resource.

resource_fields.label: Description
resource_fields.form_placeholder: Write a description for the resource
resource_fields.description: Describe the data clearly and concisely. Use as confining terms as possible to make it easier to find and understand the data.
